TEXT.TITLE: PERKIN-ELMER <PKN> WINS EPA CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Perkin-Elmer Corp said it won a contract to provide laboratory information management systems to the Enviromental Protection Agency's 10 regional laboratories. The value and the exact duration of the contract was not disclosed. The company said the contract will include hardware, software, installation, support services, and software analyst consultations. Reuter
